column2: It was contended that the order made  by the learned  High  Court

column1: Judge to remand the appellant after fixing the matter for day to day trial

column2: and  ordering  of  surety  bail  for  PW  5  is  highly  unusual  and  irregular
lacking in merit in fact or in law. And that there is reason to believe that
the said conduct of the trial judge was in order to harass and intimidate
Ordinance.  (page  5  of the  Written  submissions  of the  appellant).  The
submission of the counsel for  the appellant was that the witness PW  5
